description: On a host reboot with resume_guests_state_on_host_boot set to True, nova-compute tries to restart the instances. However, the call to _hard_reboot tries to request kernel/ramdisks from glance without having an authenticated token as there's no user context. This results in the VM going to error state.
title: On host reboot images requiring kernel disks/ramdisks fails to resume

comments.content: On a host reboot with resume_guests_state_on_host_boot set to True, nova-compute tries to restart the instances. However, the call to _hard_reboot tries to request kernel/ramdisks from glance without having an authenticated token as there's no user context. This results in the VM going to error state.
